title: SKIN999
author: SKIN999
content: We sell a large number of brand new L7, just picked up from the manufacturer, in addition if the order quantity exceeds 100 we will give free overclocking equipment, now this environment, L7 9050 or more payback cycle is the shortest, the risk is the least, in addition will inform how to go fast payback.Please contact me, our price is very favorable, in addition to a full inventory, belong to their own goods and warehouse.Contact information.E-mail: lance@unistar.mobitelegram: https://t.me/Lance994WhatsApp：+86 13688831203

comments.author: buckrogers
comments.body: Quote from: SKIN999 on November 25, 2022, 07:10:46 AMWe sell a large number of brand new L7, just picked up from the manufacturer, in addition if the order quantity exceeds 100 we will give free overclocking equipment, now this environment, L7 9050 or more payback cycle is the shortest, the risk is the least, in addition will inform how to go fast payback.Please contact me, our price is very favorable, in addition to a full inventory, belong to their own goods and warehouse.Contact information.E-mail: lance@unistar.mobitelegram: https://t.me/Lance994WhatsApp：+86 13688831203Hi, First off:This user's password was reset recently.QuoteWe sell a large number of brand new L7, just picked up from the manufacturerYou mean BITMAIN?Quotethe risk is the leastThere is always risk, and an unnecessary statementQuotein addition will inform how to go fast paybackGet rich quick? Where do we sign up?Quotein addition if the order quantity exceeds 100 we will give free overclocking equipmentWhat is this "free overclocking equipment" can you be more specific?How about starting with a picture of these L7's with a username and date near "them" on a piece of paper (or something creative) to attempt to verify legitimacy?Also keep the deals on the forum, going off forum and not using a reputable escrow is simply asking for troubleThanks!

comments.author: SKIN999
comments.body: Hello, you can contact me through the contact information above, I will tell you the specific quotation and how to use the overclocking equipment.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: SKIN999 on November 28, 2022, 04:45:43 AMHello, you can contact me through the contact information above, I will tell you the specific quotation and how to use the overclocking equipment.Dude I wish you were legit.I have done well over 100000 in usd business on this website and have perfect feedback.I would buy them one at a time up to 10 of them.  But you would need to send them to me and trust me to pay you when I get them one at a time.To which you will now say no I can't trust you.Simply speaking if you can trust me why on earth would anyone trust you?I would give my home address for shipping and I have been fully doxxed so with about 3 minutes google search you can find out exactly where I live and that I am giving you my real address.So if you want to sell gear do the transition here with me today.

comments.author: SKIN999
comments.body: QuoteDude I wish you were legit.Friends, of course it's legalQuoteTo which you will now say no I can't trust you.It is always very difficult to build trust for the first time, but once trust is established these problems will no longer existQuoteI would give my home address for shipping and I have been fully doxxed so with about 3 minutes google search you can find out exactly where I live and that I am giving you my real address.So I need you to contact me through the contact information above, so that your contact information and home address are not revealed and it is easier to contact me

comments.author: buckrogers
comments.created_time: November 30, 2022, 11:24:45 PMLast edit: December 01, 2022, 12:30:58 AM by buckrogers
comments.body: QuoteQuote from: SKIN999 on November 29, 2022, 01:41:38 AMQuoteDude I wish you were legit.Friends, of course it's legalQuoteTo which you will now say no I can't trust you.It is always very difficult to build trust for the first time, but once trust is established these problems will no longer existQuoteI would give my home address for shipping and I have been fully doxxed so with about 3 minutes google search you can find out exactly where I live and that I am giving you my real address.So I need you to contact me through the contact information above, so that your contact information and home address are not revealed and it is easier to contact me The problem here is you are asking people to transact off forum, even via private messages and not posting in the main thread and especially without escrow.Do you have any proof of purchase from BITMAIN, who you claim to have purchased these L7’s from?Any photos of the large amount of L7’s and pics of these imaginary overlocking devices you only receive if you buy over 100 units?@Phil, this one is a no go, too many red flags, and if this newbie account can’t trust a long-time member such as yourself, then there’s not much else to say really.I know you know better, but for other users, Id avoid at all costs. QuoteFriends, of course it's legalHa-ha of course, we wouldn’t ever assume otherwise  We just blindly trust a newbie coming in selling vaporware with no proof, no biggie. Transact off forum – Big red flag, nopeSome red flag highlights from the DM: QuoteI do not use the forum to trade, we use USDT to tradeQuoteFriend, I sincerely hope you can contact me through other social media, so that we can quickly understand the product price and other issuesDo you not know the price already?What issues are you expecting?As far as overclocking “equipment”:QuoteUsing overclocking equipment will increase our return on investment cycle by ten percentYes, maybe it will increase your ROI, not the buyers who will lose everything by dealing with you. You can’t even explain what this magical “overclocking device” is. Sounds like a run of the mill scam attempt with shady half assed details, and no pics. Too bad they won’t be doing much business here. Good luck!

comments.author: SKIN999
comments.body: Video verification is available for all private chats with me via social media.Hosting issues can be resolved through eBay.We also accept USDT and BTC.Also thank you very much for your interest in me.This community is getting new people every day!
